author: jochembrouwer
content: Hiya, we at JS are working at implementing beam sync-like execution. Could someone with an archive node look up this MPT key? `7b358816386f1e102a7b7e179952ef7fc704a147efd3ced90a6d3114c9411329`. Does it exist?

author: jochembrouwer
content: We execute a block 15 blocks back from the current height - but after some GetNodeData peers fail to return any node data, even when reconnecting and trying other peers, so my hunch is that something at our side is going wrong here
